name: Mineral Ooze
description: A large, amorphous ooze that resembles an oily pool or wet rock, capable of gripping and ensnaring its victims.
memorable: Utilizes grappling and encasing abilities to control enemies, making it a formidable opponent in tight spaces.
goals: To ambush and encapsulate prey, rendering them helpless.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other oozes or in damp environments where ambush tactics thrive.
environment: Dark, damp areas such as caves or underground tunnels.
strengths: Resilient with high hit points and resistance to acid, cold, and fire damage.
weaknesses: Slow movement and poor dexterity make it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Multiattack allowing two slam attacks, with the potential for grappling and an acid-infused Pseudopod attack.
most_powerful_ability: Encase ability traps and blinds its victims while dealing acid damage over time.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to detect creatures in darkness.
additional_information: Can move through narrow openings due to Amorphous trait.
False Appearance allows for effective ambush tactics.
Mineralize ability grants temporary resistance to common physical damage types.
test_queries: large ambushing ooze with acid attacks
deceptive mineral ooze that grapples foes
ooze that blends in as wet rock
slow-moving ooze with powerful encasing ability
mineral ooze ambush tactics in dark caves
